trans-unit.source: Storsimple SAS cabling for 8600 | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Storsimple SAS cabling for 8600 | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Explains how to turn on attach the SAS cables to the StorSimple 8600 device.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to turn on attach the SAS cables to the StorSimple 8600 device.

trans-unit.source: To attach the SAS cables
trans-unit.target: To attach the SAS cables

trans-unit.source: Identify the primary and the EBOD enclosures.
trans-unit.target: Identify the primary and the EBOD enclosures.

trans-unit.source: The two enclosures can be identified by looking at their respective back planes.
trans-unit.target: The two enclosures can be identified by looking at their respective back planes.

trans-unit.source: See the following image for guidance.
trans-unit.target: See the following image for guidance.

trans-unit.source: Back plane of primary and EBOD enclosures
trans-unit.target: Back plane of primary and EBOD enclosures

trans-unit.source: Back view of primary and EBOD enclosures
trans-unit.target: Back view of primary and EBOD enclosures

trans-unit.source: Label
trans-unit.target: Label

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Primary enclosure
trans-unit.target: Primary enclosure

trans-unit.source: EBOD enclosure
trans-unit.target: EBOD enclosure

trans-unit.source: Locate the serial numbers on the primary and the EBOD enclosures.
trans-unit.target: Locate the serial numbers on the primary and the EBOD enclosures.

trans-unit.source: The serial number sticker is affixed to the back ear of each enclosure.
trans-unit.target: The serial number sticker is affixed to the back ear of each enclosure.

trans-unit.source: The serial numbers must be identical on both enclosures.
trans-unit.target: The serial numbers must be identical on both enclosures.

trans-unit.source: [Contact Microsoft Support](storsimple-contact-microsoft-support.md) immediately if the serial numbers do not match.
trans-unit.target: [Contact Microsoft Support](storsimple-contact-microsoft-support.md) immediately if the serial numbers do not match.

trans-unit.source: See the following illustration to locate the serial numbers.
trans-unit.target: See the following illustration to locate the serial numbers.

trans-unit.source: Rear view of enclosure showing serial number
trans-unit.target: Rear view of enclosure showing serial number

trans-unit.source: Location of serial number sticker
trans-unit.target: Location of serial number sticker

trans-unit.source: Label
trans-unit.target: Label

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Ear of the enclosure
trans-unit.target: Ear of the enclosure

trans-unit.source: Use the provided SAS cables to connect the EBOD enclosure to the primary enclosure as follows:
trans-unit.target: Use the provided SAS cables to connect the EBOD enclosure to the primary enclosure as follows:

trans-unit.source: Identify the four SAS ports on the primary enclosure and the EBOD enclosure.
trans-unit.target: Identify the four SAS ports on the primary enclosure and the EBOD enclosure.

trans-unit.source: The SAS ports are labeled as EBOD on the primary enclosure and CTRL on the EBOD enclosure, as shown in the SAS cabling illustration, below.
trans-unit.target: The SAS ports are labeled as EBOD on the primary enclosure and CTRL on the EBOD enclosure, as shown in the SAS cabling illustration, below.

trans-unit.source: Use the provided SAS cables to connect the EBOD ports to the CTRL ports.
trans-unit.target: Use the provided SAS cables to connect the EBOD ports to the CTRL ports.

trans-unit.source: The EBOD port on controller 0 should be connected to the CTRL port on EBOD controller 0.
trans-unit.target: The EBOD port on controller 0 should be connected to the CTRL port on EBOD controller 0.

trans-unit.source: The EBOD port on controller 1 should be connected to the CTRL port on EBOD controller 1.
trans-unit.target: The EBOD port on controller 1 should be connected to the CTRL port on EBOD controller 1.

trans-unit.source: See the following illustration for guidance.
trans-unit.target: See the following illustration for guidance.

trans-unit.source: SAS cabling for your device
trans-unit.target: SAS cabling for your device
